content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetBucket path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/storage/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/buckets/{bucket_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name bucketid
desc a storage bucket id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get a bucket
responses
200
storagegetbucketresponse
type obj
storagebucket
type obj
props
id
type str
desc the id for the bucket
label
type str
desc the name of the bucket
endpointurl
type str
desc the url used to access the bucket
storagebucketvisibility
type str
default private
desc private the bucket is private and only accessibly with credentials
  public the bucket is public and accessible over the internet
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date when the bucket was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date when the bucket was last updated
region
type str
desc the region in which the bucket is created available regions are useast1 uswest1 eucentral1
desc the bucket for the given stack
title: 5_Buckets_GetBucket_25.json
